    • createSimulation

      public static itumulator.executable.Program createSimulation(String filename) throws FileNotFoundException
      Creates the simulation from a text file.
      Parameters:
      filename - The filename of where the simulation parameters are stored.
      Returns:
      Program The simulation program.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - Happens when the file can't be found.

    • createActor

      public static itumulator.simulator.Actor createActor(itumulator.world.World world, String actor_name)
      Creates actors in the world.
      Parameters:
      world - The world where the actors spawn.
      actor_name - The name of the actor in the text file.
      Returns:
      The actor object.

      Parameters:

      actor_name - The name of the actor in the text file.
      territory - The actors territory.
      Returns:
      The actor object.

    • createWolfPack

      public static ArrayList<Wolf> createWolfPack(itumulator.world.World world, int amount)
      Spawns actors in a pack
      Parameters:
      world - The world where the actors spawn.
      amount - Amount of animals in the pack
      actor_name - The name of the actor in the text file.
      Returns:
      Returns the wolf pack list.

    • findNearbyObjects

      public static <T> ArrayList<itumulator.world.Location> findNearbyObjects(itumulator.world.World world, itumulator.world.Location myLocation, Class<T> type, int range)
      finds all nearby objects, of certain type, within range of a certain location
      Parameters:
      world - The world to interact with
      myLocation - The location of e.g. the location of a rabbit
      type - Class of the objects to look for e.g. Grass
      range - the radius to look out from the location e.g. rabbit's vision range
      Returns:
      returns an Arraylist of all nearby objects of a certain type
